channel.title: Applet_Sub1 problem
channel.description:
So I'm using a 317 client and whenever I try to compile I get this error:
Applet_Sub1.java:11: error: error while writing Applet_Sub1: Applet_Sub1.class ( Access is denied) public class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Can anyone help, Please? The client is for a 317 delta source

Class15.java:10: error: error while writing Class15: Class15.class public final class Class15 ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Applet_Sub1 problem
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

That error is common when you have hidden files. Try clicking on organize in the folder and then select folder and search options then click view, and see if any files are hidden.

Read full topic
